Posts.Content: Oct 1, 2009 04:38PM lmo wrote: I took Carboplatin and Taxotere taken for 6 rounds, each 3 weeks apart and Herceptin with it and take it for a full year. My hair did not start to come out until after the 2 infusion which would have been around 28 days.  I had really healthy thick hair and it never did all come out, but very close to it.  I do wear a wig for special occasions and scarfs and hats for most of the other times.  But I agree with the others, my head did hurt and itch before it started to come out.
Posts.Title: My hair is not following out Pure carol1949

Posts.Content: Oct 1, 2009 04:25PM lmo wrote: I too can relate to you, Deborah.  I completed chemo the end of July and started radiation 3 weeks ago.  They have put me on Femara and I need advise on the Femara, I have just been on it for 1 month and have been having joint pain and pain in my heel.  I know this is a SE, but how do you know it is a SE and not bone cancer?  Just wanted to ask the ones who have been on it, and how do you cope with the pain.  My doctor said to just take over the counter pain meds.  Is there anything else out there that can help?
Posts.Title: Call me crazy... cherneski jenn3
